current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend title 46, United States Code, to extend the
		  exemption from the fire-retardant materials construction requirement for
		  vessels operating within the Boundary Line.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Commerce,
			 Science, and Transportation

cosponsor.#tail:
) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and
			 referred to the

Section 3503(a) of

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S1022 IS: To amend title 46, United States Code, to extend the exemption from the fire-retardant materials construction requirement for vessels operating within the Boundary Line.
